normalised: **Question:** What are some yoga practices I can easily incorporate into my daily routine?

unnormalised: **Question:** What are some yoga practices I can easily incorporate into my daily routine?
normalised: Hey there! So, you're looking to add some yoga to your life? That’s awesome! It’s been a total game-changer for me. Doctor Sharma at A I I M S recommended it years ago and I haven’t looked back.

unnormalised: Hey there! So, you're looking to add some yoga to your life? That’s awesome! It’s been a total game-changer for me. Dr. Sharma at AIIMS recommended it years ago and I haven’t looked back.
normalised: First off, start small. Don't aim for a full ninety minute power yoga session right away. Think of it like building a temple – brick by brick!

unnormalised: First off, start small. Don't aim for a full 90-minute power yoga session right away. Think of it like building a temple – brick by brick!
normalised: *   **Sun Salutations (Surya Namaskar):** A classic for a reason! Just five to ten rounds in the morning can energize you. YouTube is your friend here.

unnormalised: *   **Sun Salutations (Surya Namaskar):** A classic for a reason! Just 5-10 rounds in the morning can energize you. YouTube is your friend here.
normalised: *   **Simple stretches:** Before getting out of bed, try some gentle stretches. Reaching for the ceiling, hugging your knees to your chest. Makes a world of difference!

unnormalised: *   **Simple stretches:** Before getting out of bed, try some gentle stretches. Reaching for the ceiling, hugging your knees to your chest. Makes a world of difference!
normalised: *   **Breathing exercises (Pranayama):** Anulom Vilom (alternate nostril breathing) for five minutes. It calms the mind like nothing else. I do it on my commute (when I'm not driving, of course!).

unnormalised: *   **Breathing exercises (Pranayama):** Anulom Vilom (alternate nostril breathing) for 5 minutes. It calms the mind like nothing else. I do it on my commute (when I'm not driving, of course!).
normalised: *   **Meditation:** Even five minutes of sitting quietly and focusing on your breath counts. Try to create a small, peaceful space – maybe a corner in your one hundred square foot room with a little diya.

unnormalised: *   **Meditation:** Even 5 minutes of sitting quietly and focusing on your breath counts. Try to create a small, peaceful space – maybe a corner in your 100 sq ft room with a little diya.
normalised: Remember, consistency is key. Even if you only manage fifteen minutes a day, the benefits add up. And hey, don't compare yourself to that super flexible aunty at your local yoga class. Just focus on your own journey. Many local yoga places in Delhi charge around rupees five thousand per month.

unnormalised: Remember, consistency is key. Even if you only manage 15 minutes a day, the benefits add up. And hey, don't compare yourself to that super flexible aunty at your local yoga class. Just focus on your own journey. Many local yoga places in Delhi charge around Rs. 5000 per month.
